Notes: Multiple floor plans for integrated facility; apparatus bays staff areas ICP

Notes: SketchUp or Revit massing model with perspective views

Description: Key Sections Development - Vertical relationships and 16 ft door height verification

Description: Key Elevations Development - All four building facades with material indication
Concept Design Narrative - Design intent and Addendum 03 compliance documentation
Notes: Written narrative covering program fit site concept technical requirements code compliance

Description: Addendum 03 Technical Requirements Integration - 16ft doors sumps exhaust generator fill stations solar-ready
Notes: Technical coordination for specific addendum requirements

Description: Civil Engineering Coordination - Site grading drainage services routing input
Notes: Civil engineer coordination for site concept development

Description: Structural Engineering Coordination - Long-span bay structure and solar-ready roof provisions

Notes: Mechanical electrical coordination for technical requirements

Notes: Code compliance spot-check at concept stage

Description: Internal QA and Cross-Deliverable Consistency Check
